A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have no idea why others have given this film such a low score.  There were definitely some moments in there where I was surprised by the choices the director made\, but this movie definitely stands up against most of the rest of the franchise pretty well.  There are definitely some twists and turns\, and the visual spectacle is pretty tremendous.  I would say this film has a lot of rewatch value.
